description.narrative:
The MFA is in the process of formulating organisation-strategies for its partners within the area of human rights and democracy and switch to core support. The organisation-strategies respond to a formal requirement for accountable management. More importantly, they form the basis of the MFA’s dialogue with these partners and serve to enhance setting of priorities and reporting of results. The strategies will serve as a flexible and adequate basis for the grants set out in the financial Act and be aligned with the organisation’s own strategies.
The objective of this assignment is threefold:
- To prepare an organisation-strategy for DIGNITY (2019-2021) that identifies 2-3 priority areas as well as a priority related to organisational effectiveness. The organisation-strategy will be prepared according to the Guidelines for Management of Danish Multilateral Development Cooperation
- Prepare a set of management arrangements that includes provisions for reporting, accounting and budgetting for the grant
- Assist the MFA in conducting the consultation process with relevant departments of the Ministry as well as with DIGNITY.
